price: Tunay na Kami ay nagpababa nito bilang Qur’ān na Arabe, nang sa gayon kayo ay makapag-uunawa.
arabic: إِنَّآ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ قُرۡءَٰنًا عَرَبِيّٗا لَّعَلَّكُمۡ تَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: innā anzalnāhu qur'ānan ʿarabiyyan laʿallakum taʿqilūna
